description: You'll be surprised how easy it is to make this succulent chargrilled lamb shoulder. Pair it with a zesty and creamy yoghurt, tahini and mint dressing.
keywords: Butterflied Lamb Shoulder with Tahini & Yoghurt Dressing
name: Butterflied Lamb Shoulder with Tahini & Yoghurt Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.4 kg Woolworths Cook butterflied lamb shoulder with rosemary & mint
180 g baby leaf salad with beetroot

recipeInstructions.text: Combine onion and remaining lemon juice in a small bowl. Season with pepper. Slice lamb and serve with bread, dressing, onion mixture, salad leaves, extra mint and extra lemon wedges.
